General.Name: Döhler S.A
General.Description: Döhler S.A. manufactures and sells textile products in Brazil. It offers bed products, table clothing, shower, bathing clothes, and industrial and hotel textiles, as well as curtains, handicrafts, decoration products, and infantile products. The company was founded in 1881 and is headquartered in Joinville, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Arno Waldemar Döhler, nº 145, Joinville, SC, Brazil, 89219-902
